author: Staff Reporter
text:
The opposition AIADMK has called upon the Lieutenant Governor A.K. Singh to immediately intervene and order a judicial probe into the financial transactions that took place in the government-owned Anglo French Textile (AFT) mill during the last five years.

Talking to reporters here on Wednesday, AIADMK deputy legislative party leader A. Anbalagan said that the investigation should also cover the necessities of the management to dispose of machinery in the spinning and weaving units at throw away prices.

What was the need to dispose of machinery at throw away prices, asks Anbalagan
title: Plea for probe into AFT mill transactions
